attributes.action: Review the VAT tax rate to ease the burden on the British Citizens
attributes.additional_details: By reducing or scrapping VAT on weekly shopping, people will spend more on other things and it will help the economic to grow and prosper. More money to go round and creates more jobs
attributes.background: We humbly request the goverment to review the taxes we pay, specifically the VAT on food and regular shopping, reduce this to 15% until the economy recovers and inflation comes back under control

rejection.details:
Many food products are zero rated for VAT. Find out more: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/food-products-and-vat-notice-70114

You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls to review the tax system:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711458
